    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Lauches the application by calling the start method.
        Parameters:
        args - command-line arguments

      • showTable

        private void showTable()
        Displays the table containing the high scores be calling the static showTable method of class HighScoresTestDrive.

      • showDialog

        private String showDialog(String title,
                          String text,
                          String[] buttons)
        Shows a popup dialog window with two options to choose from.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the window
        text - the text displayed in the window
        buttons - the text to be displayed on the buttons
        Returns:
        the chosen option

      • startNewGame

        private void startNewGame(String difficulty,
                          Set<Integer> mineIndices)
        This method is called when starting a new game. It initializes certain variables, creates a new Board according to the specified difficulty, and whether it's a new single- or a multiplayer game. It places the Buttons representing the Cells in a GridPane.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - the difficulty level of the new game
        mineIndices - the indices of the mines to be placed

      • initializeGUI

        private void initializeGUI(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Initializes the graphical layout for both the single- and the multiplayer game. Its sets the layout for singleplayer. It defines what methods are to be called when certain MenuItems are clicked on.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the top-level JavaFX container constructed by the platform

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        The method called by the launch method in main.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the top-level JavaFX container constructed by the platform

      • convertTime

        private String convertTime(int sec)
        Converts time given in seconds to a minutes:seconds format.
        Parameters:
        sec - time given in seconds
        Returns:
        String time in a minutes:seconds format

      • createWaitAlert

        private void createWaitAlert(String ipAddress)
        Creates an alert while trying to connect to the other party.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - Other players IP address. It is ignored in server mode.

      • handleStartServer

        private boolean handleStartServer()
        Called when the user - changing to multiplayer mode - clicks on the 'I'm gonna be a server!' button. Creates a popup window, prompts the user for a name. When successful, a new TcpServer and a new Player is created, and the program waits for a client to connect.
        Returns:
        true if the user has succesfully given a username; false otherwise.

      • handleStartClient

        private boolean handleStartClient()
        Called when the user, changing to multiplayer mode, clicks on the 'I'm gonna be a client!' button. Creates a popup window, prompts the user for a name and for the ip address of the server. When successful, a new TcpClient and a new Player is created.
        Returns:
        true if the user has succesfully given a username; false otherwise.

      • changeBorder

        private void changeBorder()
        When in multiplayer mode, the active Player should always have a green border around the user picture, indicating that it's his/her turn.

      • revealBlock

        private void revealBlock(int index)
        When clicked on a Cell, if the Cell wasn't a Mine, it reveals certain Cells surrounding the clicked one. It uses an iterative algorithm, and the revealed block has elements with zero neighbouring mines on the inside, and is bounded by elements with nonzero neighbouring mines.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Cell that was clicked on

      • handleServerData

        private void handleServerData(Object data)
        Handles the incoming data on server side. The data is a Pair, and it can be a name or a move.
        Parameters:
        data - Incoming data param.

      • handleClientData

        private void handleClientData(Object data)
        Handles the incoming data on client side. The data is a Pair, it can be a name, a move or the board's params.
        Parameters:
        data - Incoming data param.

      • handleOtherPlayerMovement

        private void handleOtherPlayerMovement(int clickedIndex)
        This method is called when the other player makes a move in multiplayer mode. The method refreshes the displayed data. If the other player has clicked on a mine, the method makes sure that the player can only reveal three mines in a row.
        Parameters:
        clickedIndex - the index of the Cell clicked by the other player

      • handleMultiplayerGameEnding

        private void handleMultiplayerGameEnding()
        Handles the end phase of a multiplayer game. The game is over when the outcome is sure based on the number of revealed mines. It notifies the user about who won, and the server side player is offered to start a new game.

      • handleSinglePlayerClick

        private void handleSinglePlayerClick(boolean buttonType,
                                     int clickedIndex)
        This method is responsible for the control of the singleplayer game. The player can mark a Cell with the right mouse button, or click on one with the left mouse button. The first left mouse click starts a timer, which stops when the game is over. When the game is over, the player is notified whether he/she has won/lost the game.

        If the player has made a new high score, the showDialog method is called.

        Parameters:
        buttonType - with which mouse button has the player clicked the Button
        clickedIndex - the index of the Button clicked by the player

      • handleMultiplayerClick

        private void handleMultiplayerClick(int clickedIndex)
        This method is responsible for the control of the multiplayer game. It checks the field for mines, adjacent mines and counts the found mines in one round.
        Parameters:
        clickedIndex - index of the clicked field.

      • initializeTimer

        private void initializeTimer()
        This method is called when the player clicks with the left mouse button on a Button. It measures the time elapsed between this first click and the current time. It updates the timeElapsedLabel's SimpleStringProperty.
